text:
Record currently has no unit test cases, in the aftermath of bug 26020 (FIXED) i
wrote a set of unit test cases for record. Because the bug is marked fixed this
bug report is written so that the test cases will hopefully not be forgotten to
be added.

Test cases added as attachment in 26020

http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/showattachment.cgi?attach_id=13316
creator: jkf@apache.org
